channel.title: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯
channel.description: 软餐 - 新鲜软件资讯 - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: 《微软模拟飞行》更新了加勒比地区画面
item.description:
软餐获悉，《微软模拟飞行》（Microsoft Flight Simulator）最近迎来更新，微软添加了加勒比海地区的画面细节，包括 100 多个景点和 7 个新的机场。该地区的多座岛屿的图像获得升级，涉及安提瓜岛、阿鲁巴岛、巴哈马、巴巴多斯、英属维尔京群岛、开曼群岛、多米尼加共和国、格林纳达、海地、牙买加、波多黎各、圣基茨和尼维斯、特立尼达和多巴哥、特克斯和凯科斯群岛、美属维尔京群岛等。此外，微软还引入了经典的四座 47J Ranger 直升机。

Microsoft Flight Simulator has recently received an update, with Microsoft adding visual enhancements to the Caribbean region, including over 100 points of interest and 7 new airports. The imagery of several islands in the region has been upgraded, including Antigua, Aruba, the Bahamas, Barbados, the British Virgin Islands, the Cayman Islands, the Dominican Republic, Grenada, Haiti, Jamaica, Puerto Rico, St. Kitts and Nevis, Trinidad and Tobago, Turks and Caicos Islands, and the US Virgin Islands. Additionally, Microsoft has introduced the classic four-seat 47J Ranger helicopter.

item.title: iOS 17.4 公测版终于带来了应用侧载
item.description:
软餐获悉，苹果公司发布了 iOS 17.4 和 iPadOS 17.4 的首个公开测试版。该版本的重大变化是苹果应欧盟《数字市场法案》（DMA）的要求，为 iOS 引入了应用程序侧载能力，以及 Apple Pay 之外的替代支付选项。不过这仅适用于欧盟用户。其他新增功能包括新的表情符号、播客的转录、对 Xbox Cloud Gaming 等游戏流媒体应用程序的支持，以及下一代 CarPlay 的更新。

Apple has released the first public beta of iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4. The significant change in this version is the introduction of app sideloading capability for iOS, as well as alternative payment options beyond Apple Pay, in compliance with the EU’s Digital Markets Act (DMA). However, these changes are limited to EU users only. Other new features include new emojis, podcast transcriptions, support for gaming streaming applications like Xbox Cloud Gaming, and updates to the next-generation CarPlay.

item.title: Win11 预览版本号大跃升，Win12 的第一个版本？
item.description:
软餐获悉，Windows 研究者 @XenoPanther 分享称，微软在 Canary 通道（internal）发布的 Windows 11 预览版的版本号最近从 Build 26047 大幅跃升至 Build 27545。有人认为，版本号的巨大变化，说明 Build 27545 可能就是传闻已久的 Windows 12 的第一个版本。

上个月的消息显示，微软可能最早在 2024 年 2 月为 Windows 11 推出 「Moment 5」 更新。该更新将开放 Windows 11 24H2 的 Dev 和 Beta 频道。

Windows researcher @XenoPanther has shared that the version number of the Windows 11 preview build released on the Canary channel (internal) by Microsoft has recently jumped significantly from Build 26047 to Build 27545. Some speculate that this significant change in the version number indicates that Build 27545 could be the first version of the long-rumored Windows 12.

Last month’s reports indicated that Microsoft may introduce the 「Moment 5」 update for Windows 11 as early as February 2024. This update will open up the Dev and Beta channels for Windows 11 24H2.

item.title: 谷歌似乎关闭了地球景观网站 Earth View
item.description:
软餐获悉，谷歌似乎已将 Earth View 网站下线，该网站提供了数千张衞星拍摄的地球景观图像。自 2024 年 1 月中旬以来，该网站一直无法访问。但其 Chrome 扩展程序运行正常。谷歌尚未对此发表评论。谷歌于 2020 年曾为其添加了 1000 张新的衞星照片。Earth View 的图像也可以在 Chromecast 设备上设为壁纸。

Google appears to have taken down the Earth View website, which provided thousands of satellite-captured images of Earth’s landscapes. Since mid-January 2024, the website has been inaccessible. However, the Chrome extension is still functioning properly. Google has not yet commented on this matter. In 2020, Google added 1,000 new satellite photos to Earth View. The images from Earth View could also be set as wallpapers on Chromecast devices.

item.title: 财政部深夜发文「降低期待面对不完美」引关注
item.description:
财政部公众号于 24 日深夜发文《降低期待，坦然面对不完美》。这篇普通的 「心灵鸡汤」 文章迅速引发关注，目前文章阅读量超过 5 万。文章开头说：「生活不可能永远以同一种姿态呈现在我们面前，每个人的人生亦是如此，美好伴随着遗憾，遗憾当中也有着美好。只有降低期待，坦然面对不完美，我们才能在人生道路上勇敢前行。」

原文链接：https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/STsvfnRuuf035jiox9PM7A
